column4: had the same problem. don't know why, but if you just use synaptic package manager from the system -> administration menu, and search for wine, it works just fine
but when I install it that way there I don't get the menu option for wine installed

this is the second time I've installed, the first time (I don't remember how I installed it) I ended up with a wine section under the applications menu which had a nice Programs subsection with my installed programs in it
